page.title: 20HUNDLETON PLAYING FIELD
page.content: The village Playing Field is owned and controlled by Hundleton Community Council. The Chairman of this at present is Mr. Bill Morris. The council delegated the running of the Playing Field to a Sports Association Committee. This is chaired by Mr. John Williams and consists of local organisation representatives who help to raise funds. Facilities at present consist of a children's play area with swings slide and rocking horse, a cricket area for seniors and juniors, a football pitch for juniors and a Pony Club tuition area. There is a changing facility - a cedarwood hut with electricity and water supplies. Toilet and sewerage provision is at present being discussed. The playing areas are used by Orielton School for sports and games.
